content.en: Network community algorithms: Researchers have been exploring the use of various algorithms to improve community detection in complex networks. These algorithms include multi-objective evolutionary algorithms, genetic algorithms, co-clustering models, and adaptive evolutionary algorithms. The goal is to overcome challenges such as local optimization, weak diversity, and the identification of overlapping community structures. By applying these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance our understanding of network communities and their correlations.
content.da: Netværkssamfundsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre detektering af samfund i komplekse netværk. Disse algoritmer inkluderer multi-mål evolutionære algoritmer, genetiske algoritmer, co-clustering modeller og adaptive evolutionære algoritmer. Målet er at overvinde udfordringer som lokal optimering, svag diversitet og identifikation af overlappende samfundsstrukturer. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer sigter forskere mod at forbedre vores forståelse af netværkssamfund og deres sammenhænge.
